heroDescription: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website.
overviewDescription: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site usage, and personalize content. This policy explains what cookies are and how we use them.
whatAreCookiesDescription: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us remember your preferences and provide you with a better user experience.
cookieExample: Example: A cookie might remember that you prefer to view our website in English, so it automatically loads in English on your next visit.
howWeUseDescription: We use cookies for various purposes to enhance your experience:
use1: Remember your language and location preferences
use2: Analyze website traffic and user behavior
managementDescription: You have control over the cookies we use:
browserSettingsDescription: You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality
cookieConsentDescription: We provide cookie consent options when you first visit our website, allowing you to choose which types of cookies to accept
thirdPartyDescription: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies:
preferencesDescription: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time using the tools below.
